LocaleResource.Name: ML.Callus.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Do you have questions? Our MEDlight specialists are here to help, and it's absolutely free. Start the conversation today.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Certified.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: MEDLight GmbH is a renowned medical device manufacturer from Germany with a history spanning over six decades in the development and production of UV phototherapy and phtodynamic therapy devices. Our headquarters in Herford serves as the central hub for all processes, from product design and manufacturing to global distribution. We cater to both B2C and B2B customer groups, serving them directly and through an established network of distribution partners.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Certified.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Our business operations are characterized by a deep commitment to quality and responsibility. We undergo continuous certifications and maintain a professional quality management system that adheres to the highest European and German standards.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.ContactUs.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Get a non-binding quote and tell us a bit about yourself so we can begin setting up an order. A MEDlight representative will contact you shortly to take the next steps.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.ContactUs.Form.Email.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Your email is not a valid email address.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.ContactUs.Form.Privacy.Text
LocaleResource.Value: MEDlight GmbH will store and process your personal data according to the Information Notice. By submitting this request you consent to the processing.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Ecoflex.Figure1.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Save on initial and replacement cost while also reducing energy cosumption.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Ecoflex.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Use the full potential of standard-length lamps for patients up to 200cm. Sustainable technology that cares for patients and the planet.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE System is designed to meet your specific requirements. All models share a common foundation, boasting our unique core design along with all essential safety features.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: All lamps are arranged on a curve to concentrate the light where it is needed. The ARC-Concept provides excellent exposure to the lower extremities while allowing the treatment of even taller patients (2 meters).

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature10.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Premium cooling fans with advanced fluid-dynamic bearings keep the cabin at an unobtrusive volume level and make communication easier.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature11.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The overhead air intake keeps dust and dirt particles out of the system to maintain the maximum performance of the UV lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature12.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The open top prevents patients from feeling confined, while the UV reflectors (RSEP) act as mirrors inside the cabin. Patients enjoy the perception of a more spacious and well-ventilated environment.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature13.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Well-placed handle grips keep patients stable and in the optimal treatment position.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Intelligent placement allows 1.8m lamps to effectively perform as 2m lamps without wasting energy. This enables treatment for taller patients while embracing eco-friendliness and offering long-term cost savings with standard length lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The design is based on the human body. The result is a uniform distance to the skin which prevents under- and over-exposure. Additionally, the effective lamp setup reduces treatment times.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE series is for professionals where reliability and durability matter. The galvanized steel body and door with powder coating are constructed for long-term use.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The bottom platform and lamp shielding are made of medical-grade materials that can be removed for easy cleaning and disinfection.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shield unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Reflective back panels direct the UV light at the user, maximizing lamp efficiency and allows for shorter treatments. Simultaneously, the panels visually increase the cabin space.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Despite its compact size, every lamp uses electronic starters. Users benefit from reduced energy consumption and increased service life of the lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Smooth Air Technology (SAT) - Cooling is important because it helps to maintain the optimal temperature for the lamp to operate efficiently and effectively. If the lamp is too hot, it can result in shortened lamp life and reduced UV output. The temperature management system maximizes service life and performance.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover our state of the art technologies that make the N-LINE the best uv phototherapy cabin

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Advanced sensors continuously monitor the UV output and provide real-time dosage calculations.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: By channeling air through carefully engineered pathways, we reduce dust particles inside the equipment.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The high-efficiency fan array maximizes the lamp's life and performance without interfering with your work.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The curved lamp arrangement is based on the human body and ensures a uniform distance to the skin.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Features.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: Our most powerful and capable phototherapy system ever.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Intro.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE series is the ultimate solution for professional UV phototherapy. Featuring two exceptional models, each designed to meet your specific requirements. Both models share a common foundation, boasting our unique core design along with all essential safety features.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Intro.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Unlock the full potential of the N-LINE PRO paired with our SKINDEX software. Create patient records, streamline treatment planning, and operate the cabin with unparalleled ease. This all-in-one comprehensive workflow revolutionizes the way you manage your phototherapy treatments empowering you to focus on what matters most – your patients.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Skindex.Description
LocaleResource.Value: SKINdex is MEDlights propriety treatment management software. Combine data collection, therapy planning, and cabin operation into a single system.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Skindex.Remote.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Control up to seperate systems remotely

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.Skindex.Required
LocaleResource.Value: (SKINdex requires a N-LINE PRO or N-LINE PRO MAX)

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.DoorSensorInfo
LocaleResource.Value: The system will immediately pause the treatment when the door is opened.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.KeyLockInfo
LocaleResource.Value: Key lock to lock the cabin's door and electronics

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.MixedSpectrumInfo
LocaleResource.Value: It's possible to install two different lamp types and choose between the best treatment spectrum. The following combinations are possible: UVA-1 and UVA (PUVA), UVB-311nm (Narrowband) and UVB (Broadband)

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.NLINE.LanguageSupportInfo
LocaleResource.Value: German, English, French, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Language support can be extended.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.NLINEPRO.LanguageSupportInfo
LocaleResource.Value: German, English, French, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Language support can be extended.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.NLINEPROPLUS.LanguageSupportInfo
LocaleResource.Value: German, English, French, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Language support can be extended.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.StabilityBarsInfo
LocaleResource.Value: Two stability bars offer patients stability and support while keeping them in the correct treatment position.

LocaleResource.Name: NLINE.TechSpecs.WindowInfo
LocaleResource.Value: A UV-shielded privacy window allows performing a visual check on the patient
